net.ljcomputing.repository

Interface BaseCrudRepository<T extends PersistedEntity>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the PersistedEntity type
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,Long>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface BaseCrudRepository<T extends PersistedEntity>
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,Long>
    Interface shared by all repositories.
    Author:
    James G. Willmore

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, delete, delete, deleteAll, exists, findAll, findAll, findOne, save, save
